content: lion brand pattern # 70213a skill level easy level 2 size one size preemie 0-6 months 6-12 months finished hat circumference 11-1/2 14 17 in 29 35 5 43 cm vanna s choice® article #860 2 colors 1 ball each *olive & pea green* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers worked in the round from the top down add edging and worms in contrast color to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
